text: E jenumanja ŵankulupilile! Pati n'jesile petala lya Allah (kukupuuta ngondo) basi lolechesyani (nkanintende chilichose), soni ngasim'becheta kwa mundu jwampele salâmu (yanti): “Nganim'ba ŵakulupilila mmwejo,” (ni kum'bulaga). Nkusachilila ichindu yakumala ya umi wa duniya! Nambotu kwa Allah ni kwaili yakupata yejinji. Mmomopemo ni mwamwaŵelele ŵanganyammwe kalakala, basi Allah niŵantendele ukoto (pakun'jinjisya mu Usilamu), basi lolechesyani. Chisimu Allah abali syosope sya yankutenda aŵele Jwaasimanya chenene
